entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS AROUND 90

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
